title: Iran, China and Russia make PR hay from U.S. Afghanistan withdrawal
content:
1. Iran, China and Russia make PR hay from U.S. Afghanistan withdrawal  NBC News
  2. Afghans flee to Pakistan to escape Taliban rule  CBS Evening News
  3. Pak ISI chief hosts intelligence heads of China, Russia and other Central Asian nations to discuss Afghan situation  India Today
  4. Govt could consider amnesty for 'TTP members who lay down arms': President Alvi  DAWN.com
  5. Father Reportedly Tries To Sell 4-Year-Old Daughter In Afghanistan After Taliban Takeover  Daily Caller
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
